archimate:Grouping.name: Local Application Pattern
archimate:Grouping.documentation:
Archimate 3: http://pubs.opengroup.org/architecture/archimate3-doc/chap09.html
Smileham: This is the full pattern that I use to model an application. At it's most basic, it can be compressed down to just the "Application Component" and "Data Object" with appropriate relationships to show services, data usage, etc.
